item.title: Can the Theatrical Comedy Make a Comeback? ‘The Naked Gun’ Is the Ultimate Test
item.description: Make ’em laugh! But also, make some money. For the last decade, the theatrical comedy has been adrift, but with the success of movies like “One of Them Days” and a slew of chucklers to come this
